definitions.definition: A barbecue ( grill ) , especially an open outdoor grill built specifically for the purpose of braaing .
A social meeting, including the braaing of meat; a cookout .
examples: Come over to our place for a braai .
definitions.label_groups: chiefly South Africa , Botswana , Zambia , Zimbabwe

main_definition: ( South Africa ) A barbecue ( grill ) , especially an open outdoor grill built specifically for the purpose of braaing .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly South Africa , Botswana , Zambia , Zimbabwe ) A social meeting, including the braaing of meat; a cookout .
( uncountable ) Meat cooked by this method.
